title: The Wolverine Unleashed Extended Edition 1080p hardcodedsubfan
description:
The Wolverine Unleashed Extended Edition 1080p

Hardcoded Subtitle notes:
All Japanese language translated from the original Forced Subtitles.


This is an MP4 of the movie with the original Forced Subtitles from the DVD/Bluray now hardcoded into the picture.

If you are wanting to watch this on an Xbox, iPad, smartphone, basically any of the bagillion situations where an SRT file won't help you, then this is the version of the movie you want.

If you are the kind of person who thinks it's sacrilage (sp*) to hardcode subs, then don't download this. :P

Thanks,
hardcodedsubfan

p.s. In case you want to try this yourself: Original Video was downloaded from TPB and/or yify, I forget who the original uploader was, sorry. Srt subtitle file was downloaded from subscene.com, edited for timing with Subtitle Edit. The video and subs were combined using VidCoder. Boo Yah!

Note: This is my second upload. My first was X-Men First Class and I have since noticed problems with that conversion. I will re-up that later.

I will seed on and off for a week, after that, it's in your hands
